description:
Megumi and Momo: Who will win this round of the 3rd BOUT of Régiment du Cuisine!? Meanwhile, Takumi and Eizan prepare their "beef" themed dish. While Takumi works on his version of the traditional Japanese dish "Shigure-ni", Eizan plays dirty behind his back in order to gain an advantage! What is Takumi`s secret plan after being cornered?!
Source: crunchyroll
